description: Number of binary sequences of length n with an even number of ones, at least two of the ones being contiguous.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-5,2,1,-2).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[0, 1, 2, 4, 9]; [n le 5 select I[n] else 4*Self(n-1)-5*Self(n-2)+2*Self(n-3)+Self(n-4)-2*Self(n-5): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 20 2012
